reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is quiet, clean and located as you come into Kamloops off the Coquihalla highway from Vancouver. Our room was modern and clean, with free internet and a continental breakfast. A good hotel for a one-night stay thru the area. There is a small pool and hot tub, and the parking is fine.
reviews.title: Quiet, clean, good location.

likes.disliked: — Room was on the small side.

reviews.text: This Travelodge is located in a cluster of other chain motels overlooking Kamloops. Our room was large and clean and fairly quiet although you could hear other guests using the showers. The microwave was a welcome addition to the fridge and the room also had free wireless internet access. The complimentary breakfast was ok with a reasonable choice. The breakfast room might have been nicer if it had had some windows. We stayed here in September 2006.
reviews.title: Good for an overnight stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After a bad Ramada Inn experience in Edmonton, I was carefuly to read reviews and choose this hotel. It was modern, clean, and staff were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: nice stay

reviews.text: Swimming pool was cool, and so was hot tub.
reviews.title: Great Clean Rooms and Friendly Service!!!

reviews.text: No inroom movies, which was disappointing.
reviews.title: Hmmmm...
